clients.title: Google My Business Is Now Google Business Profile
description: As part of a move to encourage small businesses to manage their profiles directly through Google Search and Google Maps, Google announced it is rebranding Google My Business to the new Google Business Profile. With this shift key changes are coming, including the retirement of the Google My Business app.

Justia Amplify offers a number of different advertising opportunities across various channels known to increase conversions. From Google's Local Services Ads (LSAs), Google Ads, Bing Ads (PPC), and Facebook Remarketing, our marketing professionals will devise strategies that align with the overall goals and characteristics of your law firm. Justia Amplify also includes a customized client review platform that showcases your photo, practice areas, link to your website, and more.
